description: Lists all Security Hub membership invitations that were sent to the calling account. Only accounts that are managed by invitation can use this operation. Accounts that are managed using the integration with Organizations don't receive invitations.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is required for pagination. On your first call to the ListInvitations operation, set the value of this parameter to NULL. For subsequent calls to the operation, to continue listing data, set the value of this parameter to the value returned from the previous response.

nested_items.name: Invitations
nested_items.description: The details of the invitations returned by the operation.

nested_items.name: AccountId
nested_items.description: The account ID of the Security Hub administrator account that the invitation was sent from.

nested_items.name: InvitationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the invitation sent to the member account.

nested_items.name: InvitedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the invitation was sent.

nested_items.name: MemberStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the association between the member and administrator accounts.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to request the next page of results.
